medical_history.chief_complaint: Persistent linear growth and diffuse bone pain.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient presented at age 25 with continuous linear growth and diffuse bone pain, particularly at the appendicular skeleton. Symptoms became more evident after the age of 23.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Bilateral cryptorchidism treated surgically at age 6 without success; history of diabetes mellitus type 2 and insulin resistance.
medical_history.social_history: The patient is a Roman Catholic priest and denied sexual intercourse according to his religious belief.
